thread.title: Here’s a Closer Look at the Y-3 Yohji Boost Spring Collection
thread.title_full: Here’s a Closer Look at the Y-3 Yohji Boost Spring Collection

author: Jesse Bernard
title: Here’s a Closer Look at the Y-3 Yohji Boost Spring Collection
text:
Visit the original post to see all 5 images from this gallery. 
As we approach spring, Y-3 releases two new designs of the iconic Yohji Boost silhouette. The new release comes a few days after the Yohji Yamamoto and adidas joint brand teased new sneakers later this year. Coming in two monochromatic colorways, the new Yohji Boost showcase’s the brand’s ability to continue pushing boundaries.
The white sneaker sports a traditional mesh design, while the black pair receives striped nylon underlays adding a futuristic flare. The sneaker also features a supple suede heel counters, bold Y-3 branding and alternating three-stripes on the lateral side. The sleek interpretations are finished with adidas’ iconic BOOST technology for continuous responsive energy.
The Y-3 Yohji Boost is available now in select retailers and online for $320:
Shop Now In other sneaker news, the Nike Air Max 90 Ultra 2.0 gets a new ‘Militia Green’ colorway.
